headline.main: U.S. AIR VICTORIES INCREASE IN EGYPT; Black Scorpion Squadron, in Fight With Messerschmitts, Downs Another

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Oct. 31 -- Another United States fighter pilot scored a victory as the American Air Force continued to play an important role in the Allied air offensive, which is still inflicting heavy damage on Axis forward defenses and on rear areas.
